name: An 'I Am Saddled with Gambling Debts and All I Got Was this Lousy' T-shirt
data: It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
In a reversal of fortunes, the shirt brings wisdom and riches to its wearer.
